title: VOGOE Facial Cleansing Brush Rechargeable, Spin Face Wash Brush IPX7 Waterproof Electric Face Scrubber Exfoliator, 3 Speeds & 5 Brushes for Cleansing and Exfoliating, White
features: 360° Counterclockwise Spin - Powerful facial brush rotation can spin away dirt, oil, makeup, sweat, cuticles, dead cells and other toxins, reveal healthy skin and increase skin elasticity. You don't need to apply pressure on the skin to clean, this facial brush skin cleansing result is 6 times more effective than hand washing.

3 Cleansing Modes - The 3 speed settings and 5 cleanser brush make it suitable for all skin types like acne-prone sensitive skin. This face spin brush can meet your cleansing needs for different skin conditions at different times. If you are in sensitive or dry skin condition, you can choose the lowest speed.

USB Type-C Rechargeable - 600 mAh battery can last 30 days of normal daily use with only 1 hour required to fully charge. This electric face brush is portable for carrying and charging, and you don’t have to deal with batteries.

Advanced Cleansing Brush - Apply with super soft nylon material. Soft and fine brush is better to reach hard-to-clean areas, like the sides of the nose and the T-zone. Without damaging your skin, it enhances the performance of makeup remover and cleanser, and helps to shrink pores and refresh your skin.

IPX7 Waterproof - You can use this facial exfoliator in the bath or shower to do face, body and feet exfoliating safely and conveniently. The device is whole body waterproof and can be immersed in water, just put the rubber plug tightly on the charging port to keep the port dry.
